  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Place(String name, double area, PlacesType placesType)
    Constructs a new empty Place (no foods, no characters).
    Place(String name, double area, PlacesType placesType, List<Character> characters)
    Constructs a new Place with characters and no food.
    Place(String name, double area, PlacesType placesType, Set<Ingredient> foods)
    Constructs a Place with foods only.
    Place(String name, double area, PlacesType placesType, Set<Ingredient> foods, List<Character> characters)
    Constructs a Place with foods and characters.

    • buildWhitelist

      private Set<PersonType> buildWhitelist(PlacesType type)
      Create a characters whitelist who depends on the place's type
      Parameters:
      type -
      Returns:
      Set

    • display

      public void display()
      Displays a textual representation of the place, including its name, area, type, leader, and current characters.

    • addCharacter

      public void addCharacter(Character character)
      Adds a character to the place.
      Parameters:
      character - the character to add

    • addCharacterAll

      public void addCharacterAll(List<Character> chars)
      Adds a list of characters to a place *
      Parameters:
      chars - the list of characters to add to a place

    • removeCharacter

      public void removeCharacter(Character character)
      Removes a character from the place.
      Parameters:
      character - the character to remove

    • canAccept

      public boolean canAccept(Character character)
      Determines whether the given character is allowed to enter the place based on the internal whitelist of permitted character types.
      Parameters:
      character - the character attempting to enter
      Returns:
      true if the character's type is allowed, false otherwise

    • healCharacters

      public void healCharacters()
      Heals all characters currently inside the place. Each character receives a fixed amount of healing (+5 health).

    • feedCharacters

      public void feedCharacters()
      Feeds all characters currently inside the place. Each character receives a fixed amount of nourishment (+5 hunger).

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns the name of the place.
      Returns:
      the place name

    • setName

      public void setName(String name)
      Sets the name of the place.
      Parameters:
      name - the new name of the place

    • getArea

      public double getArea()
      Returns the total surface area of the place.
      Returns:
      the area in square meters

    • setArea

      public void setArea(double area)
      Sets the surface area of the place.
      Parameters:
      area - the new area in square meters

    • getPlaceType

      public PlacesType getPlaceType()
      Returns the type of this place (village, camp, battlefield, etc.).
      Returns:
      the place type

    • setPlaceType

      public void setPlaceType(PlacesType placeType)
      Sets the type of this place.
      Parameters:
      placeType - the new place type

    • getLeader

      public ClanChief getLeader()
      Returns the leader (clan chief) managing this place.
      Returns:
      the leader, or null if none

    • setLeader

      public void setLeader(ClanChief leader)
      Assigns a leader (clan chief) to this place. Note: battlefields should not have leaders.
      Parameters:
      leader - the leader to assign

    • getCharacters

      public List<Character> getCharacters()
      Returns the list of characters currently present in the place.
      Returns:
      the list of characters

    • setCharacters

      public void setCharacters(List<Character> characters)
      Sets the list of characters present in this place.
      Parameters:
      characters - the new list of characters

    • getFoods

      public Set<Ingredient> getFoods()
      Returns the list of available food items in this place.
      Returns:
      the list of ingredients, or null if none

    • setFoods

      public void setFoods(Set<Ingredient> foods)
      Sets the food items available in this place.
      Parameters:
      foods - the list of ingredients to set

    • getWhitelist

      public Set<PersonType> getWhitelist()
      Returns the whitelist of allowed character types for this place.
      Returns:
      a set of allowed PersonType values
